hero.description: Welcome to our online store! We offer a wide range of quality products from leading manufacturers.

delivery.title: Fast delivery
delivery.description: We deliver your orders in the shortest possible time throughout the country.

quality.title: Quality guarantee
quality.description: We are responsible for the quality of all products presented in our store.

payment.title: Convenient payment
payment.description: Various payment methods for your convenience.

catalog.title: Product catalog
catalog.noProductsFound: No products found. Try changing the filter parameters.

about.title: About us
about.subtitle: About our company
about.intro: We strive to provide our customers with the best products and service. Learn more about our history, mission, and team.

history.title: Our history
history.text1: Our company was founded in 2010 with the aim of providing quality products at affordable prices. We started as a small store with a limited assortment, but thanks to the support of our customers and the pursuit of excellence, we have grown into one of the leading online stores in our industry.
history.text2: Over the years, we have established strong partnerships with leading manufacturers, which allows us to offer a wide range of quality products at competitive prices. We are constantly expanding our catalog to meet the growing needs of our customers.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We carefully select products for our catalog, guaranteeing high quality and reliability of each product.

customer.title: Customer focus
customer.description: We put customer needs first and strive to provide an exceptional level of service.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We are constantly looking for new solutions and improvements to make the shopping process more convenient and enjoyable.

reason1.title: Wide assortment
reason1.description: Thousands of products from leading manufacturers in one place for your convenience.

reason2.title: Quality guarantee
reason2.description: We work only with verified suppliers and guarantee the quality of each product.

reason3.title: Fast delivery
reason3.description: We deliver orders in the shortest possible time throughout the country and abroad.

reason4.title: Professional support
reason4.description: Our specialists are always ready to help with product selection and answer all questions.

footer.aboutText: Your trusted supplier of quality products. We strive to offer the best assortment and service.
